feed.title: Gabor Szakacs
feed.subtitle: Hi, I'm Gabor Szakacs. I'm a Tech Lead at Bitise.io, I oversee the development of our web services, making fellow developers more productive and happy by providing a reliable and friendly CI for them - Bitrise. When I'm not working I like to try out new boardgames and to write a blog, apparently.

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: I’ll just leave this here as a placeholder until I upload my first post.
